name: Command
description: This log came from bot.js as the result of detecting a discord command using the tracked prefix.

name: Discord Connection Error
description: Bot lost connection to discord, It has been reconnected now, but in order to avoid spam broadcasts the startup funciton has been cancelled, As the bot has already started.

name: API Online
description: The Bungie API is back online!

name: API Offline
description: The Bungie API is temporarily disabled for maintenance.

name: New Season
description: A new season is upon us. The current season has been changed.

name: New Clan
description: A new clan has been added

name: Forced Scan
description: A forced scan has been run. All clans will now be scanned, broadcasts are disabled until done.

name: Stopped Tracking Clan
description: Disabled tracking for a clan as there are no longer any more guilds tracking it.

name: Re-Tracking Clan
description: Re-Enabled tracking for a clan as it has returned to being tracked!
